main event: A military witness observed an object emitting bright orange-reddish light moving rapidly at low altitude in New Bedford, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was reported as having the appearance of a falling meteorite with a shape resembling a hole and windows., It hovered momentarily before moving rapidly away from the witness., The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions with some scattered clouds., The object moved northwest and disappeared from view after a few seconds., The document concludes the sighting was likely an astronomical phenomenon (meteors).
